org.springframework.cloud.stream.binding

Class SingleBindingTargetBindable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.stream.binding.SingleBindingTargetBindable<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bindable

    public class SingleBindingTargetBindable<T>
extends Object
implements Bindable
    A Bindable component that wraps a generic output binding target. Useful for binding targets outside the Input and Output annotated interfaces.
    Author:
    Ilayaperumal Gopinathan, Marius Bogoevici
